title: Authentication
content:
# Authentication

You can read about the Authflow here:
<https://gogapidocs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/auth.html>

In this guide I will show you how this is effectivly done with this library in F#.

## Request authentication code

At first you need to request a authentication code. For that you need some kind of embedded
browser and point the browser to an url like:  
<https://login.gog.com/auth?client_id=46899977096215655&layout=client2&redirect_uri=__REDIRECT_URI__&response_type=code>

I use always `https://embed.gog.com/on_login_success?origin=client` as redirect uri and therefore the link is:
<https://login.gog.com/auth?client_id=46899977096215655&layout=client2&redirect_uri=https%3A%2F%2Fembed.gog.com%2Fon_login_success%3Forigin%3Dclient&response_type=code>

You can find the documentation for that endpoint here:  
<https://gogapidocs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/auth.html#methods>

The user has to login there and is redirected to an url like this:

    https://embed.gog.com/on_login_success?origin=client&code=iUZDhNPZNpQkQEPS9OqEUfyx-iNMpJT-W_AY9Miw8lpYnmkPOzE908Xp33t4cNXRUCyULAXB3koWEDFhQUzfboRrlZiKxTddDBiw-fnutQcAxmicbjdWdPnPuyZTnMC1tEsg2jZMhoeTvDt66Q5SP8idHGvqq8Z04AwOU09vkUw

The important part here is the `code=..` parameter. In this example this is

    iUZDhNPZNpQkQEPS9OqEUfyx-iNMpJT-W_AY9Miw8lpYnmkPOzE908Xp33t4cNXRUCyULAXB3koWEDFhQUzfboRrlZiKxTddDBiw-fnutQcAxmicbjdWdPnPuyZTnMC1tEsg2jZMhoeTvDt66Q5SP8idHGvqq8Z04AwOU09vkUw

This is the authentication code you need for the next step.

## Request authentication token

For this you need the used redirect uri and authentication code from the previous step. This is used to request
an authentication token, which is used to authenticate your API calls.

```fsharp
open GogApi.DotNet.FSharp

// let redirectUri = <RedirectUri>
// let authCode = <AuthenticationCode>

let newTokenAsync = Authentication.getNewToken redirectUri authCode
// newTokenAsync: Async<Authentication>
```

From here you can fire the call to the API in any way you see fitting.
E.g. you could use `Async.RunSynchronously` or if you use Elmish something like
`Cmd.OfAsync`.

The `Authentication` you get from that has to be used for the other API calls.

## Refresh authentication

Because the access token you get from GOG is only valid for a limited time, you
have to regularly refresh your tokens. You can do this manually by calling
`Authentication.getRefreshToken` or use a helper function which automatically
refreshes the authentication when the tokens validity runs out.

You can use this to autorefresh before any API call:

```fsharp
Authentication.withAutoRefresh(Games.getAvailableGamesForSearch search) authentication
```

title: Overview
content:
# Overview

The project **GogApi.DotNet** aims at providing an interface to use the (unofficial) GOG API from .NET.
At the moment the focus lies on F#.

Like the README states it uses the knowledge from
<https://www.gog.com/forum/general/unofficial_gog_api_documentation/page1> |
<https://gogapidocs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/> but
I don't rule out the possibility to further extend this (and hopefully contribute
it to linked documentation) by own investigations.

This documentation contains always info about the currently available stable release
of this project. If you want to have a look at the documentation of other version
(like prereleases) you have to build it yourself (which is quite easy tbf).

title: Authentication
content:
# Authentication

You can read about the Authflow here:
<https://gogapidocs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/auth.html>

In this guide I will show you how this is effectivly done with this library in F#.

## Request authentication code

At first you need to request a authentication code. For that you need some kind of embedded
browser and point the browser to an url like:  
<https://login.gog.com/auth?client_id=46899977096215655&layout=client2&redirect_uri=__REDIRECT_URI__&response_type=code>

I use always `https://embed.gog.com/on_login_success?origin=client` as redirect uri and therefore the link is:
<https://login.gog.com/auth?client_id=46899977096215655&layout=client2&redirect_uri=https%3A%2F%2Fembed.gog.com%2Fon_login_success%3Forigin%3Dclient&response_type=code>

You can find the documentation for that endpoint here:  
<https://gogapidocs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/auth.html#methods>

The user has to login there and is redirected to an url like this:

    https://embed.gog.com/on_login_success?origin=client&code=iUZDhNPZNpQkQEPS9OqEUfyx-iNMpJT-W_AY9Miw8lpYnmkPOzE908Xp33t4cNXRUCyULAXB3koWEDFhQUzfboRrlZiKxTddDBiw-fnutQcAxmicbjdWdPnPuyZTnMC1tEsg2jZMhoeTvDt66Q5SP8idHGvqq8Z04AwOU09vkUw

The important part here is the `code=..` parameter. In this example this is

    iUZDhNPZNpQkQEPS9OqEUfyx-iNMpJT-W_AY9Miw8lpYnmkPOzE908Xp33t4cNXRUCyULAXB3koWEDFhQUzfboRrlZiKxTddDBiw-fnutQcAxmicbjdWdPnPuyZTnMC1tEsg2jZMhoeTvDt66Q5SP8idHGvqq8Z04AwOU09vkUw

This is the authentication code you need for the next step.

## Request authentication token

For this you need the used redirect uri and authentication code from the previous step. This is used to request
an authentication token, which is used to authenticate your API calls.

```fsharp
open GogApi.DotNet.FSharp

// let redirectUri = <RedirectUri>
// let authCode = <AuthenticationCode>

let newTokenAsync = Authentication.getNewToken redirectUri authCode
// newTokenAsync: Async<Authentication>
```

From here you can fire the call to the API in any way you see fitting.
E.g. you could use `Async.RunSynchronously` or if you use Elmish something like
`Cmd.OfAsync`.

The `Authentication` you get from that has to be used for the other API calls.

## Refresh authentication

Because the access token you get from GOG is only valid for a limited time, you
have to regularly refresh your tokens. You can do this manually by calling
`Authentication.getRefreshToken` or use a helper function which automatically
refreshes the authentication when the tokens validity runs out.

You can use this to autorefresh before any API call:

```fsharp
Authentication.withAutoRefresh(Games.getAvailableGamesForSearch search) authentication
```

title: Overview
content:
# Overview

The project **GogApi.DotNet** aims at providing an interface to use the (unofficial) GOG API from .NET.
At the moment the focus lies on F#.

Like the README states it uses the knowledge from
<https://www.gog.com/forum/general/unofficial_gog_api_documentation/page1> |
<https://gogapidocs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/> but
I don't rule out the possibility to further extend this (and hopefully contribute
it to linked documentation) by own investigations.

This documentation contains always info about the currently available stable release
of this project. If you want to have a look at the documentation of other version
(like prereleases) you have to build it yourself (which is quite easy tbf).

title: GogApi.DotNet - API Reference
content:
GogApi.DotNet 
 GogApi.DotNet.FSharp GogApi.DotNet.FSharp.DomainTypes GogApi.DotNet.FSharp.Internal

title: Account
content:
Account

This module holds all API calls which have to do with games/movies on GOG

FilteredProductsRequest

Contains possible parameters with which one can specify what is searched for with

FilteredProductsResponse

Contains info about products which matched the search requested via

FilteredProductsResponseInternal GameInfoResponse

Contains detailed info about a game requested via

getGameDetails

Fetches some details about the game with given id

getFilteredGames

Searches for games owned by the user matching the given search parameters

title: Authentication
content:
Authentication

This module holds everything which is needed to authenticate to the API

TokenResponse

Typesafe variant of the response data of https://auth.gog.com/token

createAuth

Creates a new authentication from a TokenResponse

getNewToken

Uses authentication code to create a Authentication with authorization token

getRefreshToken

Tries to refresh the current authentication.

title: GalaxyApi
content:
GalaxyApi

Contains special endpoints for Galaxy

ProductsResponse

Contains info about a product requested via

SecureUrlResponse

Contains info about a secure url requested via

getProduct

Returns information about a product

getSecureDownlink

Takes a downlink from productinfo and transforms it into a secure version which can be used to download installer files

title: Helpers
content:
Helpers

This module holds everything which isn't an API call but can help with handling them

withAutoRefresh

This helper function is used to extend every API call function and provide auto refresh, if the current authentication token is not valid anymore.

title: User
content:
User

Methods used to manage the user’s account

DataGamesResponse

Contains information about owned games requested via

UserDataResponse

Contains info about a user requested via

UserDataResponseInternal WishlistResponse

Contains info about a wishlist requested via

getData

Fetches information about the currently authenticated user

getDataGames

Fetches a list of ids of the games and movies the authenticated account owns

getWishlist

Fetches information about the wishlist of the current user

title: GameFeature
content:
GameFeature

Contains some helper function for

toString

Converts a into its string representation

fromString

Converts a string representation back to a

title: Language
content:
Language

Contains some helper function for

toString

Converts a into its string representation

fromString

Converts a string representation back to a

title: OS
content:
OS

Contains some helper function for

toString

Converts a into its string representation

fromString

Converts a string representation back to a

title: Sort
content:
Sort

Contains some helper function for

toString

Converts a into its string representation

fromString

Converts a string representation back to a

title: Request
content:
Request

This module contains low-level functions and types to make requests to the GOG API

RequestParameter

Simple record for request parameters

jsonConfig

Used config for parsing the JSON API responses

createRequestParameter

Creates a RequestParameter

createOptionalRequestParameter

Creates an optional RequestParameter

setupRequest

Creates the GET request with correct authentication headers and parameters to given url

parseJson

Helper function which catches exception from FSharp.Json and returns Result type

makeRequest

Function which creates an request which will be parsed into an object after returning

title: Transforms
content:
Transforms

Contains all transforms which are necessary to parse json answers

DownloadsObjListTransform

Transforms a list of an object list into a Map from a string to a Download

ProductIdBoolMapStringTransform

Transforms a Map from string to bool into a Map from ProductId to bool

UserIdStringTransform

Transforms a string into a UserId

title: Authentication
content:
Authentication

Data which is needed to authenticate for the API

accessToken refreshToken accessExpires

title: BonusContent
content:
BonusContent

Contains some basic info about bonus content

id name type count totalSize files

title: Currency
content:
Currency

Contains info about a currency

code symbol

title: Dlc
content:
Dlc

Contains info about a Dlc for a game

title backgroundImage cdKey textInformation downloads

title: DownLink
content:
DownLink

Represents a link, which can be used to request a safe download link

DownLink

title: Download
content:
Download

Contains info about available downloads for different OSes

linux mac windows

title: DownloadOSInfo
content:
DownloadOSInfo

Contains info about a specific download for a specific OS. Is used inside of

date downloaderUrl manualUrl name size version

title: DownloadsInfo
content:
DownloadsInfo

Contains info about available downloads for a game

installers patches languagePacks bonusContent

title: File
content:
File

Contains some basic info about a file

id size downlink

title: FileSize
content:
FileSize

Represents a size of a file

FileSize

title: FriendInfo
content:
FriendInfo

Contains info about a friend

username userSince galaxyId avatar

title: GameExtra
content:
GameExtra

Contains info about an extra for a game

manualUrl downloaderUrl name type info size

title: GameFeature
content:
GameFeature

All possible game features with a custom field for new fields which are not in this API wrapper yet

Singleplayer Multiplayer Coop Achievements Leaderboards ControllerSupport InDevelopment CloudSaves Overlay Custom

title: InstallerFileInfo
content:
InstallerFileInfo

Contains info about an installer file

id size downlink

title: InstallerInfo
content:
InstallerInfo

Contains info about an installer for a game

id os version files

title: Language
content:
Language

All possible languages with a custom field for new languages which are not in this API wrapper yet

English German Frensh Spanish Italian PortugueseBrazil Portuguese Russian Polish Japanese Czech Dutch Chinese Korean Turkish Hungarian Swedish Finnish Norwegian Danish Custom

title: OS
content:
OS

All possible OSes with a custom field for new OSes which are not in this API wrapper yet

WindowsXP WindowsVista Windows7 Windows8 Windows10 OSX106 OSX107 Ubuntu Mint Ubuntu18 Custom

title: Page
content:
Page

Represents a page in requests

Page

title: Patch
content:
Patch

Contains info about a patch for a game

id language languageFull name os totalSize version files

title: Product
content:
Product

Contains info about a product

id link expandedLink

title: ProductId
content:
ProductId

Represents the id of a product (game/movie)

ProductId

title: ProductInfo
content:
ProductInfo

Contains some basic info about a product (game / movie)

id title

title: SafeDownLink
content:
SafeDownLink

Represents a link, which can be used to download a file

SafeDownLink

title: Sort
content:
Sort

All possible ways to sort with a custom field for new sorting ways which are not in this API wrapper yet

BestSelling Alphabetically UserRating DateAdded BestSellingAllTime OldestFirst NewestFirst Custom

content:
Tag

Contains info about a tag

id name productCount

content:
UserId

Represents the id of a user

UserId

content:
UserName

Represents the name of a user

UserName

title: FilteredProductsRequest

FilteredProductsRequest

Contains possible parameters with which one can specify what is searched for with

feature language page search sort system

content:
FilteredProductsResponse

Contains info about products which matched the search requested via

sortBy page totalProducts totalPages productsPerPage contentSystemCompatibility moviesCount tags products updatedProductsCount hiddenUpdatedProductsCount appliedFilters hasHiddenProducts

content:
FilteredProductsResponseInternal 
  
 sortBy  page  totalProducts  totalPages  productsPerPage  contentSystemCompatibility  moviesCount  tags  products  updatedProductsCount  hiddenUpdatedProductsCount  appliedFilters  hasHiddenProducts

content:
GameInfoResponse

Contains detailed info about a game requested via

title backgroundImage cdKey textInformation downloads galaxyDownloads extras dlcs tags isPreOrder releaseTimestamp messages changelog forumLink isBaseProductMissing missingBaseProduct features simpleGalaxyInstallers

content:
TokenResponse

Typesafe variant of the response data of https://auth.gog.com/token

expiresIn scope tokenType accessToken userId refreshToken sessionId

ProductsResponse

Contains info about a product requested via

id title purchaseLink slug contentSystemCompatibility languages links inDevelopment isSecret isInstallable gameType isPreOrder releaseDate images downloads

SecureUrlResponse

Contains info about a secure url requested via

downlink checksum

DataGamesResponse

Contains information about owned games requested via

owned

Contains info about a user requested via

country currencies selectedCurrency preferredLanguage ratingBrand isLoggedIn checksum updates userId username galaxyUserId avatar walletBalance purchasedItems wishlistedItems friends email personalizedProductPrices personalizedSeriesPrices

content:
UserDataResponseInternal 
  
 country  currencies  selectedCurrency  preferredLanguage  ratingBrand  isLoggedIn  checksum  updates  userId  username  galaxyUserId  email  avatar  walletBalance  purchasedItems  wishlistedItems  friends  personalizedProductPrices  personalizedSeriesPrices
